overview:
Jay provides both technical expertise, and extensive eCommerce experience while leading Sweet Tooth (WDCA) as a rapidly growing eCommerce customer loyalty company.

Jay El-Kaakeâ€™s programming career began at the age of ten when he built a website that reached thousands of youth around the world. Today he is the CEO and founder of Sweet Tooth, the software that has become Magentoâ€™s premier points and rewards extension. Sweet Tooth offers the most customizable points & rewards functionality available in the e-commerce industry today.

Jay is also the development mastermind behind the incredibly popular â€œEnhanced Admin Product Gridâ€, a free Magento extension that greatly improves the store owner product management experience. This extension has had more than 60,000 downloads to date, making it the 2nd most downloaded community-written extension for Magento.
